changes.description: Add the data property to the Pdf component
Add the "transform" layout property
Add syncWithAppState and initiallySelected properties to Table
Fix MenuSeparator and SubMenuitem (forwardRef)
fix: NavGroup componenet's iconVertical{Expanded,Collapsed} properties now apply based on it's 'open' state. Only the Expanded one was present before the fix.
Allow event handlers to use nested action components recursively
feat: introducing behaviors - tooltip, animation, label
fix: Modal dialog scrolling issue
Allow image to accept binary data (and use it instead of src)
Allow user-defined components in extension packages
Fixed Slider input type, label focus, readOnly property, as well as min & max value issues.
Fixed feature to add custom icons for the Carousel prev/next page buttons.
Added short debounce to ColorPicker to make changing color values with slider a bit smoother.
fix: assigning new properties to objects in xmlui script
fix: stricter empty body detection in RestApiProxy
fix: TextArea autofocus
fix: dropdownMenu overflow
fix: ability to use user defined components in triggerTemplate (dropdownMenu)
select: use focus-visible instead of focus for outline
fix: modal dialog/toast issue
form: hideButtonRowUntilDirty
fix: report errors in script tag
Avatar does not issue a resource URL warning when "url" is not specified
refactor: change LineChart/BarChart property names
Fix the layout property usage of ModalDialog
feat: style the error report colors and spaces in the browser for xmlui syntax errors

RadioGroup now correctly handles different types of initialValue property values, applies readOnly property, and places necessary ARIA tags if the required property is set. Clarified component reference description on how RadioGroup and Option handles value types.
Add FancyButton to xmlui-website-blocks
feat: BarChart - add tooltip position tracking
Review Option handling in Select and RadioGroup
feat: add animation support to all relevant components via animation and animationOptions props
feat: add support for 'uses' property
Update fontSize and lineHeight themes and style (may break existing xmlui code)
Add the autoDetectTone property to App
Update Checkbox and Switch with click event metadata
Select accepts null as an option value; it converts a value to a string no longer
Extend Text and Heading APIs with hasOverflow
Fix RestApiProxy to deliver response status when no error body specified
Bump package version
Add experimental Timer component
Add the appendBlob function to the ApiInterceptor backend
Fixed BarChart hideTickY property to not remove the Y axis when set to true.
Fixed Checkbox and Switch visual issue. Fixed Line- and BarChart visual glitch in Table.
Small fixes for tiny bugs found during MyWorkDrive update
Fixed BarChart tick labels not appearing.
fix ssr
